author: Marcus Wylie
title: How to deliver effective workplace training in a virtual space
description: An overnight shift has flipped us into the world of home working and virtual meetings.
content:
For many organisations an almost overnight shift has flipped us into the world of home working, virtual meetings and whole host of new challenges to overcome.
With travel restrictions and working from home directives in place, you might be wondering how to m… [+3437 chars]
